pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Multivariate Quadrature // Provides methods to construct multivariate grids, which can be used for multivariate quadrature. This grids can be based on different quadrature rules like Newton-Cotes formulas (trapezoidal-, Simpson's- rule, ...) or Gauss quadrature (Gauss-Hermite, Gauss-Legendre, ...). For the construction of the multidimensional grid the product-rule or the combination- technique can be applied.
